page.title: 19 Street Games contd.
page.content: Singing Games cont. The Wind, the wind Farmer in his den I had a daughter One elephant Wishy washy wee Orange, Orange Old MacDonald In/out the bluebells Oranges and Lemons The Grand Old Duke London Bridge Wash the Dishes Paddy McGinty All skipping songs Miscellaneous Miscellaneous Skipping Leapfrog Tug of War Red Letter Dizzyy Duckling Races Traffic Lights Kiss,cuddle,torture Hopscotch I wrote a letter Then we sent this list home with a question for parents to answer. The list went to 25 homes and we had 20 replies. Every parent knew more than half the games and 10 knew between 40 and 48 game. The games no parents knew were:
